sections.summary: graduated bridgewater state university in may 2015 with a bachelor's degree in aviation management and recently started the mba aviation program at embry-riddle aeronautical university at the worldwide campus with a concentration on international business. highlights double citizenship: american and brazilian. decisive excellent english communication skills critical thinking problem solving abilities business systems analysis
